name: Hasura
longDescription: The Hasura GraphQL Engine makes your data instantly accessible over a GraphQL API, so you can build and ship modern, performant apps and APIs 10x faster. Hasura connects to your databases, REST and GraphQL endpoints, and third party APIs to provide a unified, connected, real-time, secured GraphQL API for all of your data. < /p>
description: Hasura is an open-source product that accelerates API development by 10x by giving you GraphQL or REST APIs with built-in authorization on your data, instantly.
